document.full_text: thousands of street parties will be held across britain to celebrate prince william's marriage to kate middleton next month, local government officials said on saturday, as royal wedding fever grips parts of the country.
document.title: uk to hold "thousands" of wedding street parties
lines_and_colors: thousands of street parties will be held across britain to celebrate prince william's marriage to kate middleton next month, local government officials said on saturday, as royal wedding fever grips parts of the country.
